mutants.code:
def flatten_dict(dd, separator='', prefix=''):
    return {prefix + separator + k if prefix else k: v for (kk, vv) in dd.items() for (k, v) in flatten_dict(vv, separator, kk).items()} if isinstance(dd, dict) else {prefix: dd}

    return {prefix + separator + k if prefix else k: v for (kk, vv) in dd.items() for (k, v) in flatten_dict(vv, separator, kk).items()} if isinstance(dd, dict) else {prefix: dd}
